## DataLoaderState enum

Possible states of data loader

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum DataLoaderState 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  DataLoading | <code>2</code> | This state is present any time loader is loading new data, while some data were already loaded |
|  Loaded | <code>4</code> | Loader loaded and have some data to be displayed |
|  NoData | <code>3</code> | This state is present when there are no data available after loading of data |
|  NoDataLoading | <code>1</code> | This state is present during loading of data when there are no data present |
|  NotLoadedYet | <code>0</code> | Loader has not loaded any data yet, this is initial state before first try for loading data |
